I am a graduate builder, research assistant, and junior software engineer interested in data analysis/science. I'm passionate about sharing knowledge, construction, sustainability, documentation, data, web engineering, web designs, etc. I build useful [open-source projects](https://github.com/ErikMidas), speak at some meetups/conferences, and build technical communities...

**Here's a quick summary about me**:

- üòä Pronouns: He/him
- üí° Fun fact: I'm a pioneer graduate of AltSchool Africa [School of Software Engineering](https://altschoolafrica.com/schools/engineering) Class of 2023.
- üå± I‚Äôm currently learning Python for Data Analysis.
- üòä I‚Äôm seeking help with graduate opportunities in civil engineering or construction (MSc/PhD), open-source projects, hackathons, internships, and entry-level opportunities.
- üíº Job interests: Software Engineer, WordPress Plugin Development, or Data Analysis/Science (Intern or Junior level).
- üì´ You can [view my resume](#) and contact me by emailing ayotoku@gmail.com.
